text: Mansurwal Bet is a village in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located from Kapurthala, which is both district and sub-district headquarters of Mansurwal Bet. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch, who is an elected representative. == Demography == According to the report published by Census India in 2011, Mansurwal Bet has 193 houses with the total population of 908 persons of which 475 are male and 433 females. Literacy rate of Mansurwal Bet is 69.82%, lower than the state average of 75.84%. The population of children in the age group 0–6 years is 93 which is 10.24% of the total population. Child sex ratio is approximately 603, lower than the state average of 846. == Population data == {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !!
